banner.title: Cookie Management
banner.message: We use cookies to optimize your experience, analyze our traffic and offer you tailored content. Some are necessary for the proper functioning of the site.

modal.title: Cookie Settings
modal.description: You can choose which types of cookies you wish to allow. Your preferences will be kept for 6 months.

necessary.title: Strictly Necessary
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the site to function and cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Audience Measurement
analytics.description: These cookies allow us to understand how you use the site in order to improve its ergonomics.

functional.title: Advanced Features
functional.description: These cookies enable advanced features such as video playback or interactive maps.
